          The Bourgeois Pig says:
          Wine, cheese, champers, fondue in intimate EV setting.

          The Bourgeois Pig

          New York Bars & Clubs » Williamsburg » Beer Garden

          359 Metropolitan Ave.
          (Havermeyer St.)
          718-963-4140
          spuytenduyvilnyc.com
          Transit: G/L to Metropolitan Ave.-Lorimer St.
          Last updated: April 1st, 2008

          Your Rating: None yet!
          User Rating: 4 of 5

          Photos Video
          Blackbook Lowdown

          A great place for a summer beer idyll in Williamsburg. Red tin ceiling looks down on campy ephemera. Every piece of kitsch for sale. Knowledgeable and unpretentious barkeeps guide you through bewildering but excellent list of beers from around the world, especially Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuteries. We love sitting in the wilderness garden out back and playing this game: "Okay, I'm gonna order a Spkyttr Bsnchausen...think they got that?"

          User Reviews

          A great place for a summer beer idyll in Williamsburg. Red tin ceiling looks down on campy ephemera. Every piece of kitsch for sale. Knowledgeable and unpretentious barkeeps guide you through bewildering but excellent list of beers from around the world,

          Especially Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuteries. We love sitting in the wilderness garden out back and playing this game: "Okay, I'm gonna order a Spkyttr Bsnchausen...think they got that?"
